command_execution_error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please ask for help in [the support server]({url}).
command_execution_error.title: Error

guild_only.description: This command can only be used within a server channel. [Add the bot to your server.]({invite})
guild_only.title: Error

bot.migrate:
The Christmas Countdown bot now uses slash commands!
**Please re-add the bot here: https://christmascountdown.live/invite.**

member_missing_permissions.description:
You need the following permissions to use this command:
{permissions}
member_missing_permissions.title: Error

missing_permissions.description:
The Christmas Countdown bot requires the following permissions:
{permissions}
missing_permissions.title: Error

created.description:
Your countdown is not active yet! **Enable the countdown with [`/toggle`]({url}).**

When enabled, the countdown message will be sent to {channel} every morning between 05:00 and 06:00.
created.title: ‚úÖ Countdown webhook created

invalid_channel.description: Please choose a text channel or omit the channel option to use the current channel.
invalid_channel.title: ‚ùå Invalid channel

missing_permission.description: The bot does not have permission to manage webhooks.
missing_permission.title: ‚ùå Can't create webhook

days.description: There {days} or {sleeps}[(?)]({url} "What's the difference between days and sleeps?") left until Christmas!
title: {days} day left
{days} days left

donate.description:
**[Donate]({url})** to unlock these features:

\‚≠ê `autotoggle` server option
donate.title: Get premium

list.description:
Click on its name to get more information about a specific command. [Join the support server]({discord}) if you need help.
**[Click here to enable the countdown.]({enable})**
list.title: Commands

description: There is **{hours}** hour left until Christmas!

info.description: The Christmas Countdown bot for Discord by [eartharoid]({eartharoid}) has been running since November 2018. [Learn more.]({about})

disable.description:
**Server administrators: use [`/toggle`]({toggle}) to disable the countdown.**
Please consider reviewing and upvoting the bot [here]({topgg}).
Thank you for using this bot and enjoy your Christmas! üôÇ
disable.title: üéÑ Merry Christmas
